dct_title_s: Chart of isothermal lines shewing the mean annual temperature of the different parts of the earth's surface
dct_description_sm: Isothermal lines projected on map of world showing mean annual temperature on Fahrenheit scale. In lower right margin: Engd. by G. Aikman. Plate III-II from: General atlas of the world ... / engraved on steel ... by Sidney Hall, William Hughes, ,,, &c. New edition . Edinburgh : Adam and Charles Black, 1854.
